header: Community Health Access to Addiction and Mental Healthcare Project (CHAMP)

body: Text HOME to 741741 to connect to a crisis counselor
Call or text the NAMI Helpline at 800-950-6264
Call 211 for mental health and substance use resources and services

header: Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration National Helpline (SAMHSA)
body: Call 1-800-662-HELP (4357) for individuals and family members facing mental and/or substance use disorders
